title: Mallory and Mina’s Most Intriguing NFL Draft Questions | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
The Ringer’s Mallory Rubin is joined by ESPN’s Mina Kimes to discuss some of their most intriguing questions heading into the the 2020 NFL draft. Among the questions answered are who their no. 1 overall pick is, which team will have a draft-night malfunction, who will be Belichick’s next QB, who will be the fantasy rookie MVP, who will be draft night’s fashion MVP, and more.
Host: Mallory Rubin
Guest: Mina Kimes

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
